item.description:
Hi everyone, hope you are all well.

First I would like to welcome all the new members to the group its great having you on board.
I've decided to hold the first meetup for the week 3 preseason game against the colts. Hopefully this is something that everyone can come to and we can show the new members what the group is all about. If i get enough members to rsvp I can arrange to have free food for everyone attending.

Let me know what you think anyway & i'll see you hopefully on the 26th

Oran

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Indianapolis @ Green Bay Preseason Week 3
